snippet: Can a chaotic and divisive process move the country to a true democracy?
abstract: Editorial questions whether referendum on Egypt's new constitution will result in consensus needed to lay foundation for enduring democratic change, given fact that process managed by Pres Mohamed Morsi has been so chaotic and divisive.
lead_paragraph: Can a chaotic and divisive process move the country to a true democracy?

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
keywords.name: subject
